title: The Jason Ellis Interview: Getting Fired from SiriusXM, Coming out as Bi, Tony Hawk & More
description:
Jason Ellis talks about his pro skater days, getting into radio, podcasting and now working on doing stand up, until Adam crashes his dreams!
